attributes.title: Bad app. Bad person.
attributes.review: The app is very focused on Hillary, and barely mentions Trump at all. Trump is a misogynistic, racist, lying person who is a living example of everything wrong with America. If you are voting for Trump, please reconsider your decision, for he good of our country and the world.

attributes.title: Super
attributes.review: Effective way to connect to the campaign.

attributes.title: Fun and educational
attributes.review:
Trump -Pence 2016!!
What a great app for showing support, educating family and friends. Pure genius!

attributes.title: Go Trump Go!
attributes.review: Great functionality and user friendly app to follow all aspects of the Trump campaign! #TrumpPence2016 #TrumpTrain #MAGA

attributes.title: Trump!!!
attributes.review: This app is a fantastic way to support our future president! #HillaryforPrison2016

attributes.title: Wanted too much info
attributes.review: Sorry, they wanted too much personal information to be able to use the app.  I ended up deleting.  I bet half the 5 star reviews on here are from Trump himself.

attributes.title: Love it
attributes.review: Nice app. Love having up to day news on my app

attributes.title: Excellent app
attributes.review: This is a fantastic App to help us all help Make America Great Again!

attributes.title: Fantastic App
attributes.review: Well done.  Really like it so far.

attributes.title: Good app.
attributes.review: I don't use it much, but I thought I ought to make my first App Store review on Trump. #MAGA
